sql-statements.statement: SELECT hcpcs, name, replace(description, '''', '`') as description FROM REF_HCPCS WHERE hcpcs = ? AND rownum < 250
SELECT hcpcs, name, replace(description, '''', '`') as description FROM REF_HCPCS WHERE hcpcs like ? AND rownum < 250
SELECT hcpcs, name, replace(description, '''', '`') as description FROM REF_HCPCS WHERE upper(description) = ? AND rownum < 250
SELECT hcpcs, name, replace(description, '''', '`') as description FROM REF_HCPCS WHERE upper(description) like ? AND rownum < 250
SELECT hcpcs, name, replace(description, '''', '`') as description FROM REF_HCPCS WHERE upper(name) = ? AND rownum < 250
SELECT hcpcs, name, replace(description, '''', '`') as description FROM REF_HCPCS WHERE upper(name) like ? AND rownum < 250
SELECT hcpcs, name, replace(description, '''', '`') as description FROM REF_HCPCS WHERE upper(name) = ? or upper(description) = ? AND rownum < 250
